result.purpose: Responsible for managing various services related to application versioning, authentication, notifications, and updates within the manager domain.
result.architecture: The folder follows a service-oriented architecture pattern, where each file represents a distinct service responsible for specific functionalities within the application.

internal/domains/manager/services/app_ve.purpose: Defines the application version service interface and its implementation for managing app versions.

internal/domains/manager/services/auth.g.purpose: Provides authentication and authorization services for the application.

internal/domains/manager/services/coinba.purpose: Provides services for interacting with Coinbase API for session token creation and asset selection.

internal/domains/manager/services/helper.purpose: Provides error handling utilities for various services in the manager domain.

internal/domains/manager/services/mandat.purpose: Manages mandatory updates for an application, including creation and removal of updates.

internal/domains/manager/services/noti.g.purpose: This file defines a notification service interface and its implementation for managing notifications.

internal/domains/manager/services/noti_h.purpose: Handles the processing of notification whitelists in a service.

internal/domains/manager/services/operat.purpose: Defines the Operator service for managing operators in the system.
